author: mflte_mflight
post_text: September 24, 2020 at 9:57 PM#1Good afternoon lit !!!I have a macro calling another macroBut in the macro I call I don't want it to execute the last line, but I need that line when I use this macro aloneHow do I disable this line in the macro I'm going to use to call.See the attached images.image 01: the one you will callimage 02: there is a line that I don't want to execute, which would be line 15.And skip to the next macro on line 5 of image 01.how would this conditional be?Imagesimage 01 the one you will call.jpg196.8 kB720 × 1,280image 02 there is a line that I don't want to execute, which would be line 15.jpg249.77 kB720 × 1,280
title: Conditional not to execute a line
